trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The enthusiastic observer needs help retrieving lost plants.
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tufts of cloud mallow to the enthusiastic observer.
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_000<tab>What a sight! An ampelos sneezed and sent tufts of cloud mallow flying every which way.
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_001<tab>But while highly amusing, I'll never be able to gather them all up alone...unless you're willing to lend a hand?
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_002<tab>Thank you so much! Let's split up and start looking for them.
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_003<tab>Be on the lookout for fluffy white plants floating around Poieten Oikos, and bring any you find back here.
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_005<tab>Did you find any of the plants?
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_006<tab>Perfect! It's such a relief to have them back...
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_007<tab>A somewhat amateur creator invented the concept to bring more life into the clouds. Which is all well and good, but they get blown away far too easily.

TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_008<tab>It would be nice if they were a bit more wind resistant... We need to know they can settle in a place without fear of them flying off because some beast breathed on them too hard.
TEXT_AKTKZH004_04299_OBSERVER04299_000_009<tab>Well, I'd better put them back where they belong before a light breeze undoes all your hard work. Here, take this as thanks for your help.
